title: Avacyn's Judgment
text: Madness  (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)Avacyn's Judgment deals 2 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. If Avacyn's Judgment's madness cost was paid, it deals X damage divided as you choose among those creatures and/or players instead.
